attributes.action: assemble us all together so we resemble an assembly (that was a bit of a tongue twister !).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Londoners will go to the polls to elect a new mayor and members of the London Assembly on May 1. 

The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to ensure the British constitution's purpose remains - to provide a parliamentary forum for free discussion, maintaining the equity of article 1.

Please explain why one city has an assembly and another doesn't - if there are so many different assemblies developing (within and between towns, regions and Kingdoms), then it's not an assembly anymore is it ?

 
P.S. did you go any further with the petition to have a park bench put on Fearnhead Lane, Warrington for my mum ?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
